mapper.select: select e.*, ee.id as ee_id, ee.emp_id as ee_empid, ee.begin as ee_begin, ee.end as ee_end, ee.company as ee_company, ee.job as ee_job from emp e left join emp_expr ee on e.id = ee.emp_id where e.id = #{id}

SELECT ( CASE WHEN job = 1 THEN '班主任' WHEN job = 2 THEN '讲师' WHEN job = 3 THEN '学工主管' WHEN job = 4 THEN '教研主管' WHEN job = 5 THEN '咨询师' ELSE '其他' END ) as pos, COUNT(*) as count FROM emp GROUP BY job ORDER BY count
SELECT IF(gender = 1, '男性员工', '女性员工') name, COUNT(*) as value FROM emp GROUP BY gender
SELECT id, username, name FROM emp WHERE username = #{username} AND password = #{password}
